rule: Each description must include a portrayal of the background, outlining the setting or environment in which the subjects are situated.
input: In the backdrop, an ancient castle stands atop a hill surrounded by foggy moors and a dense forest under a cloudy sky.
output: "A mystical blend of mist-shrouded majesty and eerie atmospheric depth: Capture the essence of forgotten greatness in a haunting scene. Position your AI camera at eye-level with the ancient stronghold, bathed in warm golden light filtering through the fog like wispy brushstrokes on a monochromatic canvas. As night descends, coax darkness into focus by silhouetting trees against the star-kissed sky, and finally infuse an atmosphere of somber reverie - inviting the viewer to ponder secrets hidden within these hauntingly beautiful walls."
